title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 588.4 - Definitions pertaining to this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 588.4 - Definitions pertaining to this part

State Regulations
(a) Visit means a face-to-face interaction
between a recipient or collateral and clinical staff for the provision of
service. A visit shall involve one or more required or additional services or
any optional services approved by the Office of Mental Health. (b) All definitions specified in Part 587 of
this Title apply in this Part. (c) Benefit year means a 12-month period which begins the month the recipient
becomes eligible for medical assistance. (d) Home visit means an off-site visit by a
clinician to a recipient in the recipient's current primary residence, other
than a site which meets the definition of a satellite program as provided in

Part 587 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
588.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
